name: Horror graveyard labyrinth
description:
Horror graveyard labyrinth is a 3d treasure hunt, where you are searching for gold in a cemetery themed maze. There are 12 different levels to play. First ones are quite small and easy to solve. Last three labyrinths are larger and you will need more time to solve those ones. All labyrinths are filled with grave stones, spooky statues, coffins and other scary objects.

How to play:
To control you character you have to use 2 joysticks on the screen. Left joystick will move your player, right one will change your view direction. You have just one objective. Find a hidden treasure(gold coins) as soon as possible. If you get lost, just press back button on your phone to escape the maze and return to Level selection scene.

Features:
- Addictive 3d adventure
- Explore the maze, collect golden coins, and unlock new levels.
- 12 different scary levels
- Cemetery themed
- Horror background music

Because your opinion means a lot to us, please give that game a rate and a review. We really appreciate it!
